# Nested Test Question

## Question 1 
What is the German word for "house"?
- Das Haus ✓
- Der Haus
- Die Haus

## Question 2
What is the German word for "car"?
- Das Auto ✓
- Der Auto  
- Die Auto

## Question 3
Fill in the blank: "Ich wohne in einem ____." (I live in a house)
- Haus ✓
